name: Verify Manager can promote Reader to Writer
description:
-Login with valid credentials.
-Create new organization via API.
-Create new project.
-Signup second user.
-Invite second user to organization via API.
-Invite second user to project with Manager role.
-Signup third user.
-Invite third user to organization via API.
-Invite third user to project with Reader role.
Verify that:
    - Manager can promote Reader to Writer
descriptionHtml:
-Login with valid credentials.
-Create new organization via API.
-Create new project.
-Signup second user.
-Invite second user to organization via API.
-Invite second user to project with Manager role.
-Signup third user.
-Invite third user to organization via API.
-Invite third user to project with Reader role.
Verify that:
- Manager can promote Reader to Writer
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: <<User2>> :: Verify user role is valid
Message: User role should be Writer!
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:46: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/ui_steps/page_steps_impl/proj_people_page_steps.py:37: in verify_ui_user_role
    assert value.lower() == role.lower(), f"User role should be {role}!"
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: User role should be Writer!

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_ui/test_project_change_member_roles.py:989: in test_manager_change_reader_to_writer
    await u2_steps.proj_people_page.verify_ui_user_role(
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:55: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: <<User2>> :: Verify user role is valid
E   Message: User role should be Writer!
